attributes.action: Ensure that the Human Rights Act is extended so that people residing in care homes are offered the same rights as all other citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some of the most vulnerable people in our society are failed by a system that allows every person in Britain to have rights via the human rights act except those who need to live in a care home. 

I call upon the government to introduce an inclusive agenda so that the rights of those unable to protect themselves are given the same protection as every other person has - so that their value and worth can be seen to be equal to all other citizens.
